== Cadence Testing ==
This page is intended to address the short-term issue of seeing the status of testing during cadence testing weeks on the isotracker. The following images and testcases are targeted. These testcases are the mandatory testcases only for the desktop images. If a blank result is listed, the testcase needs to be tested. The goal is to have a result (passed or failed) for each testcase listed below during the week of cadence testing.

NOTE: Currently this list is being updated manually once each day, and may not represent the exact state of testing at all times for that reason.
